title: "How hospitals are using AI to teach physicians to better express empathy"
excerpt: "AI startup Virti has been working with hospitals for the past three years, with an uptick in clients since the start of the pandemic. The company offers AI-powered animations that are trained to interact with physicians and test them on practicing empathy and interpersonal skills,"
